description: This prawn noodle stir fry combines juicy seafood and crunchy Asian veggies with a spicy sriracha sauce. Take your instant noodles to another level with this quick and easy dish.
name: Sriracha Prawn Noodle Stir Fry Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: In a bowl, mix all the sauce ingredients together and set aside.
Cook instant noodles without seasoning packet as directed on the package. Drain and set aside.
In a large fry pan, heat 1 tablespoon of oil over medium-high heat. Add prawns, season with salt & pepper, cook until they change colour. Set aside.
In the same fry pan, heat 1 tablespoon of oil over low-medium heat. Stir-fry garlic, along with onions, until soft.
Add snow peas and bok choy, stir-fry for 2 minutes. Toss in noodles, prawns and sauce, stir everything together until sauce is evenly mixed.
Serve with a drizzle of TabascoÂ® Sriracha Sauce to taste.
